application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Blue Cedar - 3m Holistic crown reduction to most recent points, Lateral reduction to reshape overextended laterals back in line with main crown & deadwood.
decision_conditions: T.1 Blue Cedar - 1.5m Holistic crown reduction to bring overextended limbs back in line with naturaly shaped main crown form & remove deadwood.

The works applied for are excessive and unnecessary, the tree is largely well shaped and formed and is healthy. As such lesser works should be permitted that reduce only those limbs that have become overextended, back in line with the natural canopy shape along with the removal of any deadwood.
